UAT.GET_LINES_QUERY: SELECT INVOICE_NUM, LINE_NUMBER, LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, AMOUNT, ACCOUNTING_DATE, DESCRIPTION_LINES,AMOUNT_INCLUDES_TAX_FLAG, TAX_CODE, PO_NUMBER_LINES, DIST_CODE_CONCATENATED, ASSETS_TRACKING_FLAG, ORG, INVOICE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, VAT_ON_WHT, LINE_ID, 'SOURCE' FROM AIMS_INVOICE_NUM
UAT.SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER: SELECT ID, SERIAL_NUMB, INVOICE_NUM, INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, INVOICE_DATE,CALC_TAX_DURING_IMPORT_FLAG, VENDOR_NUM,VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_SITE_CODE,INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, EXCHANGE_RATE, EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE, EXCHANGE_DATE, TERMS_NAME,DESCRIPTION, ATTRIBUTE3, PAYEE_NAME, ACCOUNT_NO, BANK_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, SOURCE, PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE, GL_DATE FROM SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER WHERE INTEGRATION_STATUS = 'UNPROCESSED' AND ETL_STATUS = 'COMPLETED' AND DMS_WORKFLOW_STATUS = 'Approved'
UAT.SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_LINES: SELECT LINE_NUMBER, LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, AMOUNT, ACCOUNTING_DATE, DESCRIPTION_LINES,  AMOUNT_INCLUDES_TAX_FLAG, TAX_CODE, DIST_CODE_CONCATENATED FROM SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_LINES WHERE INVOICE_NUM = :invoice_num
UAT.AIMS_PAYMENTS_HEADERS: SELECT ID,SERIAL_NUMB,OPERATING_UNIT,INVOICE_NUM,INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE,INVOICE_DATE,PO_NUMBER ,VENDOR_NAME,VENDOR_SITE_CODE,INVOICE_AMOUNT,INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE,GL_DATE, DESCRIPTION, EXCHANGE_RATE, EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE, EXCHANGE_DATE,TERMS_NAME,WORKFLOW_FLAG,PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE,PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE,CALC_TAX_DURING_IMPORT_FLAG, ADD_TAX_TO_INV_AMT_FLAG,'SOURCE',ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3,PAYEE_NAME,ACCOUNT_NO,BANK_CODE,BRANCH_CODE, ERP_STATUS, ERP_STATUS_DATE, INVOICE_STATUS, INVOICE_STATUS_DATE, INTEGRATION_STATUS, INTEGRATION_DATE, EXTERNAL_INVOICE_NUMBER, VENDER_NUM FROM AIMS_PAYMENTS_HEADERS WHERE INVOICE_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - 30)
UAT.SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER_WITH_INVOICE: SELECT SERIAL_NUMB, INVOICE_NUM, INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, INVOICE_DATE, VENDOR_NUM, VENDOR_SITE_CODE, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, EXCHANGE_RATE, EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE, EXCHANGE_DATE, TERMS_NAME, DESCRIPTION, ATTRIBUTE3, PAYEE_NAME, ACCOUNT_NO, BANK_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, SOURCE, PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE, PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE, GL_DATE FROM SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER WHERE INVOICE_NUM = :invoice_num
UAT.SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_LINES_INVOICE_NUMBE: SELECT INVOICE_NUM, LINE_NUMBER, LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, AMOUNT, ACCOUNTING_DATE, DESCRIPTION_LINES,AMOUNT_INCLUDES_TAX_FLAG,TAX_CODE, DIST_CODE_CONCATENATED, TAX_CODE FROM SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_LINES WHERE INVOICE_NUM = :invoice_num AND LINE_NUMBER = :line_number
UAT.AIMS_INVOICE_NUM_FILTER_BY_INVOICE_NUMBE: SELECT INVOICE_NUM, LINE_NUMBER, LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, AMOUNT, ACCOUNTING_DATE, DESCRIPTION_LINES, AMOUNT_INCLUDES_TAX_FLAG, TAX_CODE, PO_NUMBER_LINES, DIST_CODE_CONCATENATED, ASSETS_TRACKING_FLAG, ORG, INVOICE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, VAT_ON_WHT, LINE_ID, 'SOURCE' FROM AIMS_INVOICE_NUM WHERE INVOICE_NUM = :invoice_num
UAT.INSERT_INTO_SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER: INSERT INTO SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER ( ID, SERIAL_NUMB, OPERATING_UNIT, INVOICE_NUM, INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, INVOICE_DATE, PO_NUMBER, VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_SITE_CODE, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, GL_DATE, DESCRIPTION, EXCHANGE_RATE, EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE, EXCHANGE_DATE, TERMS_NAME, WORKFLOW_FLAG, PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE, PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE, CALC_TAX_DURING_IMPORT_FLAG, ADD_TAX_TO_INV_AMT_FLAG 'SOURCE', ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, PAYEE_NAME, ACCOUNT_NO, BANK_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, ERP_STATUS, ERP_STATUS_DATE, INVOICE_STATUS, INVOICE_STATUS_DATE, INTEGRATION_STATUS, INTEGRATION_DATE, EXTERNAL_INVOICE_NUMBER, VENDOR_NUM, ETL_STATUS, DMS_WORKFLOW_STATUS, COMMENTS ) VALUES ( :id, :serial_numb, :operating_unit, :invoice_num, :invoice_type_lookup_code, :invoice_date, :po_number, :vendor_name, :vendor_site_code, :invoice_amount, :invoice_currency_code, :gl_date, :description, :exchange_rate, :exchange_rate_type, :exchange_date, :terms_name, :workflow_flag, :payment_method_lookup_code, :pay_group_lookup_code, :calc_tax_during_import_flag, :add_tax_to_inv_amt_flag, :source, :attribute2, :attribute3, :payee_name, :account_no, :bank_code, :branch_code, :erp_status, :erp_status_date, :invoice_status, :invoice_status_date, 'UNPROCESSED', ':current_datetime_str', :external_invoice_number, :vender_num, 'Pending', :dms_workflow_status, 'data added to SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER successfully' )
UAT.INSERT_INTO_SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_LINES: INSERT INTO SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_LINES ( INVOICE_NUM, LINE_NUMBER, LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, AMOUNT, ACCOUNTING_DATE, DESCRIPTION_LINES, AMOUNT_INCLUDES_TAX_FLAG, TAX_CODE, PO_NUMBER_LINES, DIST_CODE_CONCATENATED, ASSETS_TRACKING_FLAG, ORG, INVOICE_WITHHOLDING_TAX, VAT_ON_WHT, LINE_ID, 'SOURCE') VALUES ( :invoice_num, :line_number, :line_type_lookup_code, :amount, :accounting_date, :description_lines, :amount_includes_tax_flag, :tax_code, :po_number_lines, :dist_code_concatenated, :assets_tracking_flag, :org, :invoice_withholding_tax, :vat_on_wht, :line_id, :source )
UAT.UPDATE_SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER: UPDATE SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER SET ETL_STATUS = 'COMPLETED', COMMENTS = 'data added to both SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER and SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_LINES successfully' WHERE INVOICE_NUM = :invoice_num
UAT.UPDATE_NO_LINE_DATA_SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES: UPDATE SIRIUS_AIMS_PAYABLES_HEADER SET ETL_STATUS = NULL, COMMENTS = 'No Lines data found' WHERE INVOICE_NUM = :invoice_num
